org.edg.data.replication.optorsim
Class CMSDC04Users

java.lang.Object
  org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.SimpleUsers
      org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.CMSDC04Users
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, Users
public class CMSDC04Users
extends SimpleUsers

This class models the user patterns for analysis during the CMS Data Challenege 2004 which ran from March to May. Information from plots displayed at http://cmsdoc.cern.ch/cms/LCG/LCG-2/dc04/fakeanalysis/pierro/index.html was used.

The user patterns of job submission for each day are modelled as a Gaussian distribution centred around 3pm and the total number submitted each day is just under 700.

Copyright (c) 2004 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

Since:
JDK1.4
